title: This is why I cant take websites like Metacritic seriously.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/rHf6u1S.jpg

Score given by people who got paid to write a review.
http://i.imgur.com/IBoCm7S.jpg

People who actually played the fukken game.
http://i.imgur.com/4gvMAd4.jpg

So yeah by the end of the day fuck sites like Metacritic because big sample > smaller sample, and small sample doesnt mean shit.
